Package smeen.component.code.block.event

package smeen.component.code.block.event
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BroadcastAndWaitCodeBlock
    CodeBlock which will broadcast a command to WhenReceivedBroadcastCodeBlock, and will execute those if they have same command.
    BroadcastCodeBlock
    CodeBlock which will broadcast a command to WhenReceivedBroadcastCodeBlock, and will execute those if they have same command.
    WhenClickedCodeBlock
    CodeBlock which must be the first block and will start execute the block below if the sprite or scene of this CodeBlock was clicked.
    WhenKeyPressedCodeBlock
    CodeBlock which must be the first block and will start execute the block below if the selected key on keyboard was pressed.
    WhenReceivedBroadcastCodeBlock
    CodeBlock which must be the first block and will start execute the block below if received given broadcast command.
    WhenSceneChangeToCodeBlock
    CodeBlock which must be the first block and will start execute the block below if the scene in StageArea was changed to selected order.
    WhenStartCodeBlock
    CodeBlock which must be the first block and will start execute the block below if the flag button at the StageArea was pressed.
